about_the_game:
Planned Features

  • Level Progression: Unlock new tasks, items, and challenges as you level up.
  • Idle & Clicker Mechanics: Click to progress faster, upgrade gear for efficient idling.
  • Card Collecting: Randomly drop cards from idled tasks, each offering unique benefits.
  • Skilling System: Train skills, gather resources, and craft items for continuous growth.
  • Quests & Lore: Push the narrative forward, uncover secrets, and explore new territories.
  • Strategic Depth: Customize your strategy with skills, cards, and resource management.

Welcome to Mythaven

Embark on an epic journey in Mythaven Rise, where ancient mysteries and powerful elements shape your destiny. Dive into a world rich with lore, strategic gameplay, and endless adventure. As you progress through levels, you'll unlock new tasks, items, and challenges, making each step in Mythaven a new discovery. Whether you’re an avid collector or a master strategist, Mythaven Rise offers something for everyone as you uncover its secrets and build your legacy.

Idle & Clicker Gameplay with Skilling System

Progress at your own pace with Mythaven Rise’s blend of idle and clicker mechanics, designed for both casual and dedicated players. Every click accelerates your advancement, while upgraded gear ensures your character keeps progressing even when you’re away. Train a variety of skills, gather resources, and craft powerful items as you move through levels, unlocking new tasks and items to further enhance your journey through Mythaven.

Card Collecting, Random Drops, & Stat Mastery

Discover a dynamic card collection system that’s more than just collectibles. Cards will randomly drop from idled tasks, each offering unique benefits when equipped—whether it’s monsters boosting your attack or specialized cards enhancing your skilling prowess. Customize your deck to suit your playstyle, and strategically leverage the power of your cards to gain the upper hand in your adventures.

Quests Unveiling Mythaven’s History

Embark on quests that not only challenge your skills but also reveal the rich history of Mythaven. Each quest pushes the narrative forward, unlocking the secrets of the past and guiding you to explore new boundaries of the unknown. As you progress, new content, abilities, and lore will be revealed, making every achievement a step deeper into the expansive story of Mythaven.

Strategic Depth, Endless Adventure

Delve into the strategic layers of Mythaven Rise, where every decision counts. Whether you’re managing resources, choosing which skills to develop, or optimizing your card deck, the game offers endless possibilities for strategy and replayability. With a world that evolves with your actions, Mythaven Rise promises an adventure that never truly ends, ensuring that there's always a new challenge on the horizon.

Community & Developer Feedback

As a solo developer, your input is my guiding star in shaping Mythaven Rise. I’m committed to creating a game that resonates with players, and your feedback is crucial to that process. Join the community, share your ideas, and be a part of the journey as we continue to expand and refine the world of Mythaven together.

Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 and later
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: Unleash ancient powers and master the art of Celestite in an epic idle clicker RPG where you shape the fate of a medieval world. Discover skills, forge legendary tools, and uncover lore as you build your legacy in a land steeped in cosmic energy. Click your way to greatness and watch Mythaven rise!
